name: TestComplete Configuration File
summary: Learn about .TCLS files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: TestComplete projects and project suites allow you to test different applications using the same settings. A TCLS file allows you to retain the settings of the project or project suite you are testing locally. A .PJS and .MDS file is similar to a TCLS file but they are used to store broad settings for a project and project suite.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
